column4: i-A Son, I am not sure what you need to know. I do know that when I teach my students at the Academy where I teach, I teach them the basics on how to understand the CMOS setup and the BIOS structure and how the computer works.
I teach A+ and CCNA classes.
Also Engineering as well as Electrical Engineering.
acclaimtech: please try to stay in channel topic, feel free to use #ubuntu-offtopic for chatting
